# Chamu Pages - Static Website Specialist

## About
High-performance portfolio website for Chamu Pages, specializing in building lightning-fast static websites for growth-focused businesses. Focused on extreme speed (100/100 Lighthouse), SEO, and high-conversion architecture.

## Services
- Custom Static Website Development (HTML/CSS/JS)
- Performance & Conversion Optimization
- SEO-Ready Architecture
- Dark Mode & Responsive Design

## Key Features
- Zero bloat architecture (no heavy frameworks)
- Centralized icon system (localized SVGs)
- Interactive animations (GSAP, Warp Canvas)
- Accessible & SEO-friendly markup

## Site Structure
- Home: https://chamu.pages.dev/
- Privacy Policy: https://chamu.pages.dev/privacy.html
- Terms of Use: https://chamu.pages.dev/terms.html
- Service Agreement: https://chamu.pages.dev/service-agreement.html

## Tech Stack
- HTML5, Vanilla CSS, JavaScript, Alphine.js
- Tailwind CSS (Static build)
- Cloudflare Pages (Hosting)

## Contact
- Email: chamu.pages@gmail.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/chamu-pages
